history.proof: intros i. unfold message_enables_label. intros net H. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat i : Client_index net : network H : In {| pSrc := Server; pDst := Client i; pBody := Locked |} (nwPackets net) Unable to unify "In {| pSrc := Server; pDst := Client i; pBody := Locked |} (nwPackets net)" with "lb_step_ex lb_step_async (MsgLocked i) net".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall i : Client_index, message_enables_label {| pSrc := Server; pDst := Client i; pBody := Locked |} (MsgLocked i)

Premises:
Inductive Msg : Set := Lock : Msg | Unlock : Msg | Locked : Msg
pSrc = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (pSrc, _, _) := p in pSrc : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> name Arguments pSrc {P params}
Inductive Name : Type := Client : Client_index -> Name | Server : Name
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> msg Arguments pBody {P params}
Client_index = fin num_Clients : Type
pDst = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, pDst, _) := p in pDst : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> name Arguments pDst {P params}
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
message_enables_label = fun (p : packet) (l : label) => forall net : network, In p (nwPackets net) -> lb_step_ex lb_step_async l net : packet -> label -> Prop
Inductive Label : Type := InputLock : Client_index -> Label | InputUnlock : Client_index -> Label | MsgUnlock : Label | MsgLock : Client_index -> Label | MsgLocked : Client_index -> Label | Nop : Label | Silent : Label
Lock_enables_MsgLock : forall i : Client_index, message_enables_label {| pSrc := Client i; pDst := Server; pBody := Lock |} (MsgLock i)
Lock_delivered_MsgLock : forall i : Client_index, message_delivered_label {| pSrc := Client i; pDst := Server; pBody := Lock |} (MsgLock i)
Unlock_enables_MsgUnlock : forall n : name, message_enables_label {| pSrc := n; pDst := Server; pBody := Unlock |} MsgUnlock
head_grant_state_unlock : forall (st : network) (tr : list (name * (input + list output))) (c : Client_index) (t : list Client_index), step_async_star step_async_init st tr -> queue (nwState st Server) = c :: t -> In {| pSrc := Server; pDst := Client c; pBody := Locked |} (nwPackets st) \/ held (nwState st (Client c)) = true \/ In {| pSrc := Client c; pDst := Server; pBody := Unlock |} (nwPackets st)
Unlock_delivered_MsgUnlock : forall n : name, message_delivered_label {| pSrc := n; pDst := Server; pBody := Unlock |} MsgUnlock
MsgUnlock_moves_client : forall (n : nat) (c : Client_index) (s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output)))), lb_step_execution lb_step_async s -> Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) Server)) (S n) c -> now (occurred MsgUnlock) s -> next (fun s0 : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s0)) Server)) n c /\ (n = 0 -> In {| pSrc := Server; pDst := Client c; pBody := Locked |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s0))))) s
Unlock_in_network_eventually_MsgUnlock : forall (c : name) (s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output)))), lb_step_execution lb_step_async s -> weak_fairness lb_step_async label_silent s -> In {| pSrc := c; pDst := Server; pBody := Unlock |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s))) -> eventually (now (occurred MsgUnlock)) s
held_eventually_Unlock : forall (s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output)))) (c : Client_index), lb_step_execution lb_step_async s -> weak_fairness lb_step_async label_silent s -> held (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) (Client c)) = true -> eventually (fun s0 : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => In {| pSrc := Client c; pDst := Server; pBody := Unlock |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s0)))) s
InputUnlock_held : forall (s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output)))) (c : Client_index), lb_step_execution lb_step_async s -> held (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) (Client c)) = true -> now (occurred (InputUnlock c)) s -> next (fun s0 : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => In {| pSrc := Client c; pDst := Server; pBody := Unlock |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s0)))) s
clients_only_move_up_in_queue : forall (n : nat) (c : Client_index) (s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output)))), lb_step_execution lb_step_async s -> Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) Server)) (S n) c -> weak_until (fun s0 : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s0)) Server)) (S n) c) (next (fun s0 : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => Nth (queue (nwState (evt_a (hd s0)) Server)) n c /\ (n = 0 -> In {| pSrc := Server; pDst := Client c; pBody := Locked |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s0)))))) s
held_until_Unlock : forall (c : Client_index) (s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output)))), lb_step_execution lb_step_async s -> held (nwState (evt_a (hd s)) (Client c)) = true -> weak_until (fun s0 : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => held (nwState (evt_a (hd s0)) (Client c)) = true) (next (fun s0 : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))) => In {| pSrc := Client c; pDst := Server; pBody := Unlock |} (nwPackets (evt_a (hd s0))))) s
LockServ_nwnw_input_handlers_new_new : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> distinct_pairs_and LockServ_network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ms)
LockServ_nwnw_net_handlers_new_new : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), NetHandler (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> LockServ_network_invariant sigma p -> distinct_pairs_and LockServ_network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ms)
send_packets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (src : name) (ps : list (name * msg)) => map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := src; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), name -> list (name * msg) -> list packet Arguments send_packets {P params} _ _%list_scope /
ClientNetHandler = fun (i : Client_index) (m : Msg) => match m with | Locked => put {| queue := []; held := true |};; write_output Locked;; ret (MsgLocked i) | _ => ret Nop end : Client_index -> Msg -> Handler Data
locks_correct_locked_at_head : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) (c : Client_index), pDst p = Client c -> pBody p = Locked -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> at_head_of_queue sigma c
ServerNetHandler = fun (src : Name) (m : Msg) => st <- get;; (let q := queue st in match m with | Lock => match src with | Client c => (when (null q) (send (src, Locked));; put {| queue := q ++ [c]; held := held st |});; ret (MsgLock c) | Server => ret Nop end | Unlock => match q with | _ :: x :: xs => put {| queue := x :: xs; held := held st |};; send (Client x, Locked) | _ => put {| queue := []; held := held st |} end;; ret MsgUnlock | Locked => ret Nop end) : Name -> Msg -> Handler Data
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : name; pDst : name; pBody : msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
step_async_init = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) => {| nwPackets := []; nwState := init_handlers |} : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network Arguments step_async_init {P params}
unlabeled_multi_params = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams base_params) => {| name := lb_name; msg := lb_msg; msg_eq_dec := lb_msg_eq_dec; name_eq_dec := lb_name_eq_dec; nodes := lb_nodes; all_names_nodes := lb_all_names_nodes; no_dup_nodes := lb_no_dup_nodes; init_handlers := lb_init_handlers; net_handlers := unlabeled_net_handlers; input_handlers := unlabeled_input_handlers |} : forall base_params : BaseParams, LabeledMultiParams base_params -> MultiParams base_params Arguments unlabeled_multi_params {base_params labeled_multi_params}
LockServ_BaseParams = {| data := Data; input := Input; output := Output |} : BaseParams
init_data = fun _ : Name => {| queue := []; held := false |} : Name -> Data
Record Decomposition (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) : Type := Build_Decomposition { state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop; network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant_sym : forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 -> network_network_invariant p2 p1; state_invariant_init : state_invariant init_handlers; state_invariant_maintained_input : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) ->...-> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) } Arguments Build_Decomposition _ _ (_ _ _ _)%function_scope _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
LockServ_LabeledParams = {| lb_name := Name; lb_msg := Msg; lb_msg_eq_dec := Msg_eq_dec; lb_name_eq_dec := Name_eq_dec; lb_nodes := Nodes; lb_all_names_nodes := In_n_Nodes; lb_no_dup_nodes := nodup; label := Label; label_silent := Silent; lb_init_handlers := init_data; lb_net_handlers := fun (dst src : Name) (msg : Msg) (s : data) => runGenHandler s (NetHandler dst src msg); lb_input_handlers := fun (nm : Name) (msg : input) (s : data) => runGenHandler s (InputHandler nm msg) |} : LabeledMultiParams LockServ_BaseParams
locked_in_flight_all_clients_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet), pBody p = Locked -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> locks_correct sigma -> forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false
locks_correct_unlock_at_head : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) (c : Client_index), pSrc p = Client c -> pBody p = Unlock -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> at_head_of_queue sigma c
Label_rect : forall P : Label -> Type, (forall c : Client_index, P (InputLock c)) -> (forall c : Client_index, P (InputUnlock c)) -> P MsgUnlock -> (forall c : Client_index, P (MsgLock c)) -> (forall c : Client_index, P (MsgLocked c)) -> P Nop -> P Silent -> forall l : Label, P l
Label_rec : forall P : Label -> Set, (forall c : Client_index, P (InputLock c)) -> (forall c : Client_index, P (InputUnlock c)) -> P MsgUnlock -> (forall c : Client_index, P (MsgLock c)) -> (forall c : Client_index, P (MsgLocked c)) -> P Nop -> P Silent -> forall l : Label, P l
Label_sind : forall P : Label -> SProp, (forall c : Client_index, P (InputLock c)) -> (forall c : Client_index, P (InputUnlock c)) -> P MsgUnlock -> (forall c : Client_index, P (MsgLock c)) -> (forall c : Client_index, P (MsgLocked c)) -> P Nop -> P Silent -> forall l : Label, P l
Label_ind : forall P : Label -> Prop, (forall c : Client_index, P (InputLock c)) -> (forall c : Client_index, P (InputUnlock c)) -> P MsgUnlock -> (forall c : Client_index, P (MsgLock c)) -> (forall c : Client_index, P (MsgLocked c)) -> P Nop -> P Silent -> forall l : Label, P l
Build_Decomposition : forall (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) (state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop) (network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop) (network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop), (forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 -> network_network_invariant p2 p1) -> state_invariant init_handlers -> (forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')) ->...-> Decomposition B M
Inductive step_async (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_async net net' [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] Arguments step_async {P params} Arguments StepAsync_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepAsync_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope
fin = fix fin (n : nat) : Type := match n with | 0 => False | S n' => option (fin n') end : nat -> Type Arguments fin _%nat_scope
Inductive lb_step_async (P : BaseParams) (labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P) : lb_step_relation network label (name * (input + list output)) := LabeledStepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (lb : label), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> lb_net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> lb_step_async net lb net' [(pDst p, inr out)] | LabeledStepAsync_input : forall (h : lb_name) (net net' : network) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data)...
nodup = NoDup_cons Server (fun H : In Server (map Client (all_fin num_Clients)) => let H0 : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) -> exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l := fun (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B) => match in_map_iff f l y with | conj x _ => x end in let H1 : exists x : Client_index, Client x = Server /\ In x (all_fin num_Clients) := H0 Client_index Name Client (all_fin num_Clients) Server H in match H1 with | @ex_intro _ _ x (conj H3 _) => let H5 : False := eq_ind (Client x) (fun e : Name => match e with | Client _ => True | Server => False end) I Server H3 in False_ind False H5 end) (NoDup_map_injective Client (fun (x y : Client_index) (_ : In...
ClientIOHandler = fun (i : Client_index) (m : Msg) => match m with | Lock => send (Server, Lock);; ret (InputLock i) | Unlock => data <- get;; when (held data) (put {| queue := []; held := false |};; send (Server, Unlock));; ret (InputUnlock i) | Locked => ret Nop end : Client_index -> Msg -> Handler Data
LabeledStepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (lb : label), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> lb_net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> lb_step_async net lb net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
locks_correct_unlock_input_handlers_new : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ms -> pSrc p = h -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
Inductive Nth (A : Type) : list A -> nat -> A -> Prop := Nth_0 : forall (x : A) (l : list A), Nth (x :: l) 0 x | Nth_S : forall (l : list A) (x : A) (n : nat) (y : A), Nth l n x -> Nth (y :: l) (S n) x Arguments Nth {A}%type_scope _%list_scope _%nat_scope Arguments Nth_0 {A}%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Nth_S {A}%type_scope [l]%list_scope [x] [n]%nat_scope
LockServ_nwnw_input_handlers_old_new : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p p' : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> LockServ_network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ms -> pSrc p' = h -> LockServ_network_network_invariant p p'
